Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.name: trackScreen(screenName:extraParams:)
Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.abstract: This method is called when a new screen is shown to the user and tracked by our Checkout.

Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.name: trackEvent(screenName:action:result:extraParams:)
Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.abstract: This method is called when a new event is ocurred to the user and tracked by our Checkout.

Protocols/MLCardFormLifeCycleDelegate.ht.name: didAddCard(cardID:)
Protocols/MLCardFormLifeCycleDelegate.ht.abstract: A new credit card has been added sucesfully.

Protocols/MLCardFormLifeCycleDelegate.ht.name: MLCardFormLifeCycleDelegate
Protocols/MLCardFormLifeCycleDelegate.ht.abstract: Implement this protocol in order to keep you informed about important actions in our card form life cycle.

Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.name: MLCardFormTrackerDelegate
Protocols/MLCardFormTrackerDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol to stay notified about our tracking screens/events.

Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html#/c:@CM@ML.name: setPrivateKey(privateKey:)
Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html#/c:@CM@ML.abstract: Private key provides save card capabilities and account money balance. (User logged)

Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html#/c:@CM@ML.name: setTrackingConfiguration(trackingConfiguration:)
Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html#/c:@CM@ML.abstract: It provides support for tracking related functionalities.

Classes/MLCardForm.html#/c:@CM@MLCardFor.name: setupController()
Classes/MLCardForm.html#/c:@CM@MLCardFor.abstract: Setup MLCardForm settings and return main ViewController. Push this ViewController in your navigation stack.

Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html.name: MLCardFormBuilder
Classes/MLCardFormBuilder.html.abstract: CardForm builder allows you to create a MLCardForm. You’ll need a publicKey from MercadoPago Developers Site.
